properties.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 7:42PM PST until February 7 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Persistent snow to continue over parts of northeast Washington
and north Idaho...

* WHAT...Snow for the higher elevations of the Camas Prairie.
Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, and Soldiers Meadow
Road.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Expect difficult
driving conditions on the higher elevations of Highway 95.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will slowly rise overnight.
Expect wet and slushy conditions by early Friday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY FOR THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS OF THE CAMAS PRAIRIE
